job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongThis candidate must have authorization to work in the US full time This position does NOT offer sponsorship now or in the near future at this timestrongppbrppM3 is a global and diversified technology company that is ranked by Forbes as one of the top 5 fastest growing innovative companies in the world in 2018 Through our awardwinning digital platform MDLinxcom we provide healthcare professionals with the clinical education training research and career opportunities they need to succeedppbrppWe are wellestablished in our market with a loyal following high quality offerings and over 15 years of experience and history in the digital space Due to our continued growth and expansion we are currently hiring for a Software Engineer for our physician platform who will develop and improve MDLinxcom M3s awardwinning service that helps to inform educate and save time for busy physicians and other health care professionals With the opportunity to receive frequent feedback from users via regular interviews develop product enhancements and new services participating in all parts of the process from architecture and design to development and production deployment to monitoring reporting and iterative enhancementppbrppThe Software Engineer will use their knowledge of React Typescript and GraphQL on the frontend andor Python Flask Docker and Kubernetes on the backend to deliver services that help reduce the burden of keeping up with new medical research and taxing overworked health care professionalsppbrppDuties and ResponsibilitiespulliPrototype design and develop software services for doctors supporting desktop and mobile devicesliliWork closely with a crossfunctional team including engineers product and design staff to develop a great user experience and achieve product objectivesliliDevelop APIs and API clients as necessary to connect frontend and backend services thirdparty services etcliliReview and help to improve other engineers code and application designsliliUnderstand business objectives and physician user needs and actively work to improve the effectiveness and usability of our productsliliWrite unit functional and endtoend testsliliRespond to and troubleshoot production issuesliulpbrppRequirementspulliTwo or more years of experience designing implementing and maintaining production web applications full timeliliExpertise with at least one serverside web framework and programming languageliliExpertise with Javascript andor ideally Typescript and at least 1 year of experience with ReactliliSolid understanding and knowledge of web protocols and technologies such as HTTP HTML5 CSS etcliliAbility and desire to quickly pick up new technologies and frameworksliliExperience working as part of a team to develop software preferably using an agile processliliExcellent written communication skillsliliBachelors degree from a fouryear university in computer science or equivalent work experience and foundational knowledge of software engineeringliliExperience working with containers Docker infrastructure automation technologies ideally Terraform continuous integration and continuous deployment CircleCI KubernetesliliExpertise developing mobile applicationsliliExperience with development using IaaS platforms preferably AWS andor GCPliliData analysis experience and expertiseliulpbrppBenefitsppA career opportunity with M3 USA offers competitive wages and benefits such aspulliHealth and DentalliliLife Accident and Disability InsuranceliliPrescription PlanliliFlexible Spending Accountlili401k Plan and MatchliliPaid Holidays and VacationliliSick Days and Personal DaysliulpM3 reserves the right to change this job description to meet the business needs of the organizationp
